description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Tiramisu Trifle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Tiramisu Trifle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the cocoa over the top and chill until required. Decorate with chocolate curls prior to serving.
